HTTP Routing Table

/accounts | /passwordreset | /sessions | /twofactor
 
/accounts
POST /accounts
PUT /accounts
 
/passwordreset
POST /passwordreset
PUT /passwordreset
 
/sessions
GET /sessions
POST /sessions
DELETE /sessions
 
/twofactor
GET /twofactor
POST /twofactor
